results.name: Primes p such that p - 1 is not 3-smooth.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pierpont Prime
formula: a(n) ~ n log n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 29 2018
program: (PARI) is(n)=my(q=n-1); q>>=valuation(q,2); q/=3^valuation(q,3); q>1 && isprime(n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 29 2018
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 29 2006
